events.message: I have filed a claim following a collision that damaged my car significantly last night on Elm Street.
Your claim has been categorized under Auto Accident as per the details provided in your initial report.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle your auto accident claim and will contact you shortly.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the vehicle accident and are now processing your case.
Please submit the police report, photos of the damaged car, and your driver's license to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents, including the official police report and photos, have been submitted for your review.
An investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted materials and will assess liability and damage.
The investigation into the accident details has been completed; all findings have been documented for review.
We have proposed a settlement amount covering the repair costs for your vehicle minus your deductible.
The customer has responded, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and prompt service.
Your claim has been approved, and the payment process will begin shortly to cover all eligible damages.
Payment covering the approved amount has been issued directly to your listed bank account.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed following the payment issuance and case resolution.
All records related to your claim have been archived securely for future reference if needed.
